glossentry.glossdef: The word dependencies in XML documents refers to resources or references that are relied upon in a particular scope (e.g. the scope of the entire project or a particular DITA map) for a selected resource. This is helpful if you want to see where the resource is used or referenced in the entire hierarchy of the project or map. For example, you might want to look for the dependencies of an XML document to find all the instances where it is referenced throughout the hierarchy of a project or DITA map.
